description:
Beautiful Apartment with everything you need to be comfortable, train station and bus station right in the corner, it is safe and fine neighborhood, you will love it. NOT SMOKING OR PARTY INSIDE THE APARTMENT.

nice bedroom and bathroom in a very nice environment

everything, the entire Apartment

as often as you need

I have everything around the corner, transportation, food.. etc

all the transportation
name: 1BR APARTMENT IN MANHATTAN NEW YORK
review: The apartment has a great location, very easy access to subway and transportation. Overall good experience.
